page.title: 08WANSFORD COMMUNITY LIFE
page.content: Our questionnaire about community involVement was returned by a majority of adults and old age pensioners which we felt reflected the village population. The Wansford area has a church, Women's Institute, British Legion, Evergreen Club and a few smaller organisations which offer community involvement. The response to the questionnaire indicates that the church and the Women's Institute are the most popular institutions. Although 43% of all the responses said they only attended uillage events once a year, 16% and 18% attended village events once or twice a fortnight respectively. Many people felt that all age groups were served adequately by the local clubs, but a few thought there was a shortage of facilities for the younger generation.
